channel.title: Entrepreneurship on Data Automation
channel.description: Recent content in Entrepreneurship on Data Automation

item.title: Social and environmental impact businesses x repetitive and scalable businesses
item.description: There exists the first sector, made by governmental institutions, second sector, made by private companies, and third sector, made by non-profit organizations. Part of these organizations from second sector is trying to position themselves closer from the third, making up what is being called sector 2.5. What are these companies and how do the differ from the traditional second sector?
